sparsegl 0.3.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

Fit data

Creating sparsegl objects or cv.sparsegl objects from Cross-validation.

sparsegl()

Fits the regularization paths for sparse group-lasso penalized learning problems.

cv.sparsegl()

Cross-validation for a sparsegl object.

Plot and predict functions

Plot and predict for sparsegl or cv.sparsegl objects.

plot(<cv.sparsegl>)

Plot cross-validation curves produced from a cv.sparsegl object.

plot(<sparsegl>)

Plot solution paths from a sparsegl object.

coef(<cv.sparsegl>)

Get coefficients or make coefficient predictions from a cv.sparsegl object.

coef(<sparsegl>)

Extract model coefficients from a sparsegl object.

predict(<cv.sparsegl>)

Make predictions from a cv.sparsegl object.

predict(<sparsegl>)

Make predictions from a sparsegl object.

print(<sparsegl>)

Print a sparsegl object.

Risk estimation

Calculate information criteria for model evaluation and model selection.

estimate_risk()

Calculate information criteria.

Norm calculation

one_norm() two_norm() grouped_one_norm() grouped_two_norm() grouped_sp_norm() gr_one_norm() gr_two_norm() sp_group_norm()

Calculate some common group norms
